item.title: Why Choose Us
item.description:
Why Choose Mold Inspection 24/7

We do more than “check for mold.” We use applied science, professional credentials, and decades of experience to investigate root causes and document risk clearly.

Why People Choose Us

  • Certified Industrial Hygienist (CIH) — board-certified expert in exposure science
  • Not tied to remediation — we don’t sell cleanups, just truth
  • Advanced diagnostics — moisture mapping, building science, VOC screening
  • Clear reports — designed for legal defensibility
  • Fast turnaround — 24/7 availability for urgent cases
  • Florida licensed mold assessor — license #MRSA2531

What Makes a “Real” Expert?

Anyone can buy a mold test kit. Not everyone is trained in exposure pathways, airflow mechanics, or regulatory thresholds.
